sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function FAQ() { return (

Frequently Asked Questions

What is a hackathon?

A hackathon is a event where
students come together to design
and build awesome projects for a
period of time. A great opportunity
for students to gather up, learn, and
make friends!

Who is allowed to participate?

Anyone is welcome to participate.
However, only students attending middle
or high school in the US are
qualified for prizes.

How many people per team?

A team should consist of 1-4
people. Prizes will be distributed
per team.

Do I need to know how to code?

Not a lot! Actually, if this is your
first time participating in a hackathon,
this can be a great opportunity to learn.

I am a complete beginner, what do I do?

What is the hackathon's format?

Do we get to keep our project once we built them?

Got more questions?

); } export default FAQ;
